name: HKAuthorizationStatus
desc: Constants indicating the authorization status for a particular data type.

items.name: case notDetermined
items.desc: The user has not yet chosen to authorize access to the specified data type.

items.name: case sharingDenied
items.desc: The user has explicitly denied your app permission to save data of the specified type.

items.name: case sharingAuthorized
items.desc: The user has explicitly authorized your app to save data of the specified type.
